issue.title: [FCD] Ballot Comment GB-92

discussion.p: Trivial functions implicitly declare a noexcept exception specification, so the references to has_trivial_* traits in the has_nothrow_* traits are redundant, and should be struck for clarity.
discussion.blockquote: Accepting n3142 would solve this issue.

issue.resolution: For each of the has_nothrow_something traits, remove all references to the matching has_trivial_something traits.
